eval.name: MissingCatNum
eval.desc: %d - Number of Collection Objects with a null Catalog Number

evals.eval: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM collectionobject WHERE CatalogNumber IS NULL AND CollectionID = COLMEMID

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT NM, CNT FROM (SELECT NM, COUNT(NM) CNT FROM (SELECT LOWER(CONCAT(IFNULL(LastName, ''), ' ', IFNULL(FirstName, ''), ' ', IFNULL(MiddleInitial, ''))) NM FROM agent WHERE DivisionID = DIVID AND SpecifyUserID IS NULL) T0 GROUP BY NM) T1 WHERE CNT > 1 ORDER BY CNT DESC, NM ASC) T2

eval.name: TooManyContinents
eval.desc: %d - Number of continents and oceans. There should be no more than 12.

evals.eval: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM geography WHERE RankID = 100 AND GeographyTreeDefID = GEOTREEDEFID

eval.name: DuplicateContinents
eval.desc: %d - Number of duplicate continents or oceans.

evals.eval: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT * FROM (select COUNT(GeographyCode) CNT FROM geography WHERE RankID = 100 AND GeographyTreeDefID = GEOTREEDEFID GROUP BY GeographyCode) T1 WHERE CNT > 1) T2;

eval.name: CountryParentedWrong
eval.desc: %d - Number of Countries not parented to a Continent

evals.eval: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM geography g1 INNER JOIN geography g2 ON g1.ParentID = g2.GeographyID WHERE g1.RankID = 200 AND g2.RankID <> 100 AND g1.GeographyTreeDefID = GEOTREEDEFID

eval.name: CountryParentedWrong
eval.desc: %d - Number of States not parented to a Country

evals.eval: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM geography g1 INNER JOIN geography g2 ON g1.ParentID = g2.GeographyID WHERE g1.RankID = 300 AND g2.RankID <> 200 AND g1.GeographyTreeDefID = GEOTREEDEFID

eval.name: CountryParentedWrong
eval.desc: %d - Number Counties not parented to a State

evals.eval: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM geography g1 INNER JOIN geography g2 ON g1.ParentID = g2.GeographyID WHERE g1.RankID = 400 AND g2.RankID <> 300 AND g1.GeographyTreeDefID = GEOTREEDEFID

eval.name: GeographyISO
eval.desc: %d percent of the geography Continent and Country records are missing their ISO Codes

evals.eval: SELECT (CN / SM * 100.0) FROM (SELECT COUNT(*) SM FROM geography WHERE RankID > 0 AND RankID < 300 AND GeographyTreeDefID = GEOTREEDEFID) T1, (SELECT COUNT(*) CN FROM geography WHERE RankID > 0 AND RankID < 300 AND GeographyCode IS NULL AND GeographyTreeDefID = GEOTREEDEFID) T2

eval.name: TaxonParentedWrong
eval.desc: %d Species Taxonomy record(s) not parented to a Genus

evals.eval: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM taxon t1 INNER JOIN taxon t2 ON t1.ParentID = t2.TaxonID WHERE t1.RankID = 220 AND t2.RankID < 180 AND t1.TaxonTreeDefID = TAXTREEDEFID

eval.name: TaxonParentedWrong
eval.desc: %d Genus Taxonomy record(s) not parented to a Family

evals.eval: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM taxon t1 INNER JOIN taxon t2 ON t1.ParentID = t2.TaxonID WHERE t1.RankID = 180 AND t2.RankID < 140 AND t1.TaxonTreeDefID = TAXTREEDEFID

eval.name: DuplicateFamilyNames
eval.desc: %d - Number of sets of duplicate family names.

evals.eval: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT COUNT(FullName) CNT FROM taxon WHERE TaxonTreeDefID = TAXTREEDEFID AND RankID = 140 GROUP BY FullName) T1 WHERE CNT > 1

eval.name: LocalityMissingLatLon
eval.desc: %d percent of Locality records that are missing their Latitude, Longitude.

evals.eval: SELECT (CN / SM * 100.0) FROM (SELECT COUNT(*) CN FROM locality WHERE (Latitude1 IS NULL OR Longitude1 IS NULL) AND DisciplineID = DSPLNID) T1, (SELECT COUNT(*) SM FROM locality WHERE DisciplineID = DSPLNID) T2

eval.name: CEMissingLocality
eval.desc: %d percent of Collecting Event records that are missing their Locality.

evals.eval: SELECT (CN / SM * 100.0) FROM (SELECT COUNT(*) CN FROM collectingevent ce LEFT JOIN locality l ON ce.LocalityID = l.LocalityID WHERE ce.DisciplineID = DSPLNID AND l.LocalityID IS NULL) T1, (SELECT COUNT(*) SM FROM collectingevent WHERE DisciplineID = DSPLNID) T2
SELECT COUNT(CNT) FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT COUNT(l.LocalityName) CNT FROM locality l WHERE DisciplineID = DSPLNID GROUP BY l.LocalityName) T1 WHERE CNT > 1) T2

eval.name: LocalityMissingLatLon
eval.desc: %d percent of Locality records that are missing geography.

evals.eval: SELECT (CN / SM * 100.0) FROM (SELECT COUNT(*) CN FROM locality WHERE GeographyID IS NULL AND DisciplineID = DSPLNID) T1, (SELECT COUNT(*) SM FROM locality WHERE DisciplineID = DSPLNID) T2

eval.name: Paleo
eval.desc: %d percent Collection Objects with no Paleo Context information.

evals.eval: SELECT (CN / SM * 100.0) FROM (SELECT COUNT(*) CN FROM collectionobject co LEFT JOIN paleocontext p ON co.PaleoContextID = p.PaleoContextID WHERE p.LithoStratID IS NULL AND p.ChronosStratID IS NULL AND p.BioStratID IS NULL AND co.CollectionID = COLMEMID) T1, (SELECT COUNT(*) SM FROM collectionobject co LEFT JOIN paleocontext p ON co.PaleoContextID = p.PaleoContextID WHERE co.CollectionID = COLMEMID) T2

eval.name: Missing PaleoInformation
eval.desc: %d percent of Paleo Context records have no information.

evals.eval: SELECT (CN / SM * 100.0) FROM (SELECT COUNT(PaleoContextID) CN FROM paleocontext WHERE ChronosStratID IS NULL AND LithoStratID IS NULL AND BioStratID IS NULL) T1, (SELECT COUNT(*) SM FROM paleocontext) T2

eval.name: Missing InstGUID
eval.desc: The Institution GUID field must have a value.

evals.eval: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM institution WHERE GUID IS NULL
